channel.title: Polaris Tools on Apache Polaris
channel.description: Recent content in Polaris Tools on Apache Polaris

item.title: Iceberg Catalog Migrator
item.description: Iceberg Catalog Migrator is a command-line tool to migrate Iceberg tables from one Iceberg catalog to another. To use this tool, please see this guide.

item.title: Polaris MCP Server
item.description: Polaris MCP Server is a package that provides Python implementation of the Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Apache Polaris. It wraps the Polaris REST APIs so MCP-compatible clients (IDEs, agents, chat applications) can issue structured requests via JSON-RPC. To use this tool, please see this guide.

item.title: Polaris Benchmarks
item.description: Polaris Benchmarks is a tool to measure the performance of Polaris. It can be used for comparing the performance of different Polaris instances or for monitoring the performance of a Polaris instance over time. To use this tool, please see this guide.

item.title: Polaris Console
item.description: The Polaris Console is a modern web interface for the Polaris server. You can find more details about Polaris Console on the README.md.

item.title: Polaris Synchronizer
item.description: The Polaris Synchronizer is a tool to migrate entities from one Polaris instance to another. To use this tool, please see this guide.
